HITMAN Close"> Silverballer Agent 47â€™s iconic signature weapon. A stylish and powerful handgun with a low rate of fire that delivers high damage, even at range.
Lockpick Silently and discretely open physical locks with precision, but at the risk of raising suspicion. The ideal tool for the patient assassin.
Briefcase The perfect choice for an assassin who needs to conceal, carry and quickly retrieve illegal items. Occasionally defies the laws of physics.
Rubber Ducky More than just a distraction, this small but potent device will incinerate those unfortunate enough to interact with it. Remote and proximity variations are available.
